menu.title: Cheese Burger
menu.description: Our burger is seasoned with a pinch of salt, pepper and onion powder. It is topped with pickles, lettuce, tomato, onions, and American cheese. Assembled on a perfectly toasted bun.

menu.title: Gourmet Pizza
menu.description: Topped with premium grilled chicken, olives, tomatoes, onions, spinach. Baked to perfection with premium mozzarella cheese and hearty marinara sauce.

menu.title: Fried chicken
menu.description: A crispy chicken fried to perfection. Marinated in buttermilk and five species. Delightful in every bite. A house favorite.

menu.title: Chicken Sandwich
menu.description: A crispy chicken breast with delightful flavors served on a perfectly toasted, buttered bun. It is topped with mayonnaise, lettuce, and pickles.

menu.title: Cheese pizza
menu.description: Simple yet truly delicious. Made with premium Mozzarella cheese and has only three components: Pizza base, Marinara Sauce, and Mozzarella cheese. You can customize it for thin crust

menu.title: Fries
menu.description: Our fries are made from premium quality potatoes and seasoned to perfection. Enjoy it as a side or combine it with any entree

menu.title: Chocolate smoothie
menu.description: Just simply delicious and refreshing. Made with high-quality chocolate and unsweetened cocoa powder, peanut butter, and vanilla extract. It is thick and creamy!

menu.title: Lemonade
menu.description: This refreshing drink is prepared from fresh lemons. Goes best with any of our entrees or sides.
